title: Creating an Equation
text: Complementary angles add to $$90$$, so we have $$x+y=90$$. We also know that $$-x+2y=12$$

title: Elimination
text: We can eliminate $$x$$ from the equation by adding. We have $$3y=102$$

title: Solving for X, Y
